expage-201611 - global glacial 10Be and 26Al exposure age data

Owen et al. (2003d)	boulder	Owen2003d-18	Owen2003d-G	Q23	37.702	101.461	4180	5	2.7	1	280000	10000	LLNL3000	1600000	130000	KNSTD	2001	4120	220	3880	310	4147	265	148	4048	426	330	-

Reference:
Owen LA, Spencer JQ, Ma HZ, Barnard PL, Derbyshire E, Finkel RC, Caffee MW, Nian ZY, 2003d. Timing of Late Quaternary glaciation along the southwestern slopes of the Qilian Shan, Tibet. Boreas 32, 281-291.

Data comments:
Latitudes and longitudes based on map figures and Google Earth.
Sample thickness, sample density, and 10Be standard derived from Owen and Dortch (2014) supplementary table.
Sampling year assumed to be 2001.

expage.github.io
